com.orgsync.api

Interface CheckbooksResource


  • public interface CheckbooksResource

    Access to the checkbooks resource from the OrgSync API. This allows a client to get all checkbooks, create, update and delete checkbooks. A client can also manage entries for a checkbook.

    See: https://api.orgsync.com/api/docs/v2/checkbooks

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Checkbook>> createCheckbook(int orgId, String name, boolean isReadOnly)
      Create a new checkbook for a given or with a given name.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<CheckbookEntry>> createCheckbookEntry(int checkbookId, String amount, String description)
      Create a checkbook entry in the given checkbook with the amount and description.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> deleteCheckbook(int checkbookId)
      Delete the checkbook with the given id.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> deleteCheckbookEntry(int checkbookEntryId)
      Delete a checkbook entry.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Checkbook>> getCheckbook(int checkbookId)
      Get a single checkbook.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<CheckbookEntry>>> getCheckbookEntries(int checkbookId)
      Get the checkbook entries for a given checkbook.

      Get a specific checkbook entry

      Get all of the checkbooks.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Checkbook>>> getOrgCheckbooks(int orgId)
      Get the checkbooks for a given org.

      Update the name of a given checkbook.

    • Method Detail

      • getCheckbooks

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Checkbook>>> getCheckbooks()
        Get all of the checkbooks.
        Returns:
        a future to the response of all checkbooks

      • getCheckbook

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Checkbook>> getCheckbook(int checkbookId)
        Get a single checkbook.
        Parameters:
        checkbookId - the id of the checkbook to get
        Returns:
        a future to the response of the checkbook

      • createCheckbook

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Checkbook>> createCheckbook(int orgId,
                                                       String name,
                                                       boolean isReadOnly)
        Create a new checkbook for a given or with a given name.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the org that owns this checkbook
        name - the name of the checkbook
        isReadOnly - whether or not this checkbook is read only
        Returns:
        a future to the response of the new checkbook

      • updateCheckbook

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Checkbook>> updateCheckbook(int checkbookId,
                                                       String name,
                                                       boolean isReadOnly)
        Update the name of a given checkbook.
        Parameters:
        checkbookId - the id of the checkbook
        name - the updated name
        isReadOnly - whether or not this checkbook is read only
        Returns:
        a future to the response of the checkbook

      • deleteCheckbook

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> deleteCheckbook(int checkbookId)
        Delete the checkbook with the given id.
        Parameters:
        checkbookId - the id of the checkbook to delete
        Returns:
        a future to the response

      • getOrgCheckbooks

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Checkbook>>> getOrgCheckbooks(int orgId)
        Get the checkbooks for a given org.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the org to get checkbooks for
        Returns:
        a future to the response to a list of checkbooks

      • getCheckbookEntries

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<CheckbookEntry>>> getCheckbookEntries(int checkbookId)
        Get the checkbook entries for a given checkbook.
        Parameters:
        checkbookId - the id of the checkbook
        Returns:
        a future to the response of the checkbook entries

      • getCheckbookEntry

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<CheckbookEntry>> getCheckbookEntry(int checkbookEntryId)
        Get a specific checkbook entry
        Parameters:
        checkbookEntryId - the id of the checkbook entry
        Returns:
        a future to the response of the checkbook entry

      • createCheckbookEntry

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<CheckbookEntry>> createCheckbookEntry(int checkbookId,
                                                                 String amount,
                                                                 String description)
        Create a checkbook entry in the given checkbook with the amount and description.
        Parameters:
        checkbookId - the id of the checkbook
        amount - the amount of the entry
        description - the description for this entry
        Returns:
        a future to the response of the new checkbook entry

      • updateCheckbookEntry

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<CheckbookEntry>> updateCheckbookEntry(int checkbookEntryId,
                                                                 String amount,
                                                                 String description)
        Update a checkbook entry's amount and description
        Parameters:
        checkbookEntryId - the id of the entry to update
        amount - the updated amount
        description - the updated description
        Returns:
        the future to the response of the updated checkbook entry

      • deleteCheckbookEntry

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> deleteCheckbookEntry(int checkbookEntryId)
        Delete a checkbook entry.
        Parameters:
        checkbookEntryId - the id of the entry to delete
        Returns:
        a future to the response
